name: Miss Evolution
description:
A game about totally natural evolution

You are in charge of natural evolution. armed with your .50 cal natural selection device go forth and travel to different planets. There you will naturally select the right animals to evolve earths new creatures.

Travel to different planets 

Yeet cute animals 

Inspect cute animals DNA

Evolve cute animals into the right ones

WARNING 

This is a game jam game. its very rough around the edges.

I am very tired

Miss Evolution was made in 7 days for the Space Jam

(OLD VERSION) Stage guide below if you get stuck SPOILERS
